title: Climate Engineering, Government Criminality, And Vaccine Dangers: Major Northern California Event
cleaned_text:
On the evening of Friday, July 28th, 2017, a major public awareness / action event is scheduled at the Red Lion Hotel ballroom (which seats 600) in Redding, California. This gathering will address three of the most primary threats we collectively face: covert climate engineering, completely out of control government criminality and lethal vaccinations. There will be three back to back expert PowerPoint presentations to provide the most recent hard-hitting front-line data on each of these three critically important subjects (climate engineering, government criminality, and vaccine dangers). This is a FREE public education event organized and funded exclusively by GeoengineeringWatch.org, there is no admission fee. Free informational materials and DVDs will also be available for those who attend. This event will open to the public at 4 p.m. on the afternoon of the July 28th, the first presentation will begin promptly at 6 p.m. (the full event schedule is below). From 6 p.m. to 6:50 p.m. Dr. Sherri Tenpenny will present: "Vaccines 101- The Science You Need To Know" (this is an all new and completely updated PowerPoint presentation). Dr. Tenpenny is greatly respected as one of the country's most knowledgeable and outspoken physicians regarding the negative impact vaccines can have on health. As an internationally known speaker, Dr. Tenpenny is highly sought after for her ability to present scientifically sound information regarding vaccination hazard and warnings that are rarely portrayed by conventional medicine (to view Dr. Tenpenny's last Northern California presentation, click HERE). From 7 p.m. to 7:45 p.m. Dane Wigington of GeoengineeringWatch.org will present "Geoengineering: Waging Weather Warfare On World Populations" (this is an all new and completely updated PowerPoint presentation). Dane is the lead researcher and administrator for GeoengineeringWatch.org, the largest and most visited climate engineering website / data archive in the world (over 27,000,000 visitors and counting). Covert global climate engineering programs are wreaking havoc with Earth's life support systems and human health (due to the highly toxic fallout from climate engineering).
• Completely disrupting the hydrological cycle (rain cycle) all over the planet
• Destroying the ozone layer which is causing off the chart levels of UV radiation
• Contaminating our air, soils, and waters with highly toxic heavy metals
• Being carried out illegally under the guise of "national security" To view a former Northern California presentation by Dane Wigington, click HERE. From 8 p.m. to 8:50 p.m. former CIA officer, Kevin Shipp, will present "Shadow Government: The Unconstitutional Power Of Government Secrecy" (this is an all new and completely updated PowerPoint presentation). Kevin Shipp, a former CIA Officer and Antiterrorism expert, held several high level positions in the CIA. He was assigned as a protective agent for the Director of Central Intelligence, a counterintelligence investigator, a Counter Terrorism Center officer, a team leader protecting sensitive CIA assets from assassination, a manager of high-risk protective operations, a lead instructor for members of allied governments, an internal staff security investigator, and a polygraph examiner. He was tasked with protecting the CIA from foreign agent penetration and the chief of training for the CIA federal police force. Mr. Shipp functioned as program manager for the Department of State, Diplomatic Security, and Anti Terrorism Assistance global police training program. He is the recipient of two CIA Meritorious Unit Citations, three Exceptional Performance Awards and a Medallion for overseas covert operations. He is the author of From the Company of Shadows–CIA Operations and the War on Terrorism (to view Kevin Shipp's last Northern California presentation, click HERE) From 9 p.m. to 9:45 p.m. Q and A will commence with all three speakers at the panel table. Though seating is limited for this essential public awareness event (the Redding Red Lion Hotel ballroom seats 600), we are already trying to make arrangements for a real time monitor screen in the lobby of the Hotel in order to provide viewing for any overflow attendance. There will also be several informational booths set up in the lobby / event entrance area with free essential informational materials (again, the event doors will open at 4 p.m., a full 2 hours before the first presentation begins). The Red Lion Hotel has graciously given us a discounted room rate of $99 for those that wish to book a room at the hotel. Click the reservation button below to get the discounted rate, or call the Red Lion Hotel directly and let them know you are attending the July 28th event. Converging catastrophes are closing in on us from countless directions, this conclusion cannot be rationally denied if the front-line data is objectively investigated. The July 28th Redding, California, event will provide critical information on what we collectively face, and what we can do to turn the tide. The fight for the greater good is a burden that must be born by us all, our time is running out. Taking action is essential, I hope all that are able to attend the upcoming Redding awareness event, will.

 DW
